hooks.name: Lint on File Save
hooks.description: Automatically check TypeScript/TSX files for errors when saved
hooks.message: Check this file for TypeScript and linting errors using getDiagnostics

hooks.name: Validate Gemini Service
hooks.description: Validate Gemini service maintains proper error handling and API patterns
hooks.message: Validate that this file has proper try-catch blocks, follows naming conventions (get*), handles sourceUrls parameter, and includes required prompt sections

hooks.name: Validate Constants Data
hooks.description: Validate game data consistency in constants.ts
hooks.message: Validate that all WOW_CLASSES have valid IDs, each class has specs, all specs have valid roles, all dungeons have valid expansions, no duplicates exist, and color values are valid hex codes

hooks.name: Validate Type Definitions
hooks.description: Check type definition consistency across the codebase
hooks.message: Verify that all exported types in types.ts are used in at least one file, check for circular dependencies, validate naming conventions (PascalCase), and identify unused type definitions
